body.p: Whitley County politician. Married Violet Dickerson Gillis in 1833. Father of Joseph Gillis, Mary Gillis, Elizabeth Jane Gillis, Edward Gillis, and Amner Gillis. Served in the Senate of the Kentucky General Assembly from 1855 to 1863.
